name: BANK BURNER (LD44)
description:
You're a banker. After a strange incident, your valuables turned sentient and lit the bank on fire! It's up to you to rush in and capture all of them. Better make it quick, or you'll be toast!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse - Shoot

E - Restart Level

Space / Escape - Pause

F / F4 / F1 on menu for fullscreen.

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 44 Compo.
